DOC.brief_summary: Fatigue, or asthenia, is an important symptom for the diagnosis and follow-up of patients in routine as well as research oriented clinical practice. Various questionnaires measuring fatigue have been developed, but few have been validated in french. MFI (Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory) has been validated in french in only one study. BFI (Brief Fatigue Inventory) has been translated but never validated in french language. The main purpose of this study is to validate psychometrically the french version of BFI.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of the French Version of the Fatigue Score "Brief Fatigue Inventory ( BFI)".
